MTABLE: New tables (2018) fitting SNAG average reflectivities. Experimental version using COH=1: reflectivity is reduced due to coherent scattering for wavelength below Ni and Ti Bragg edges. Use with care: not validated. ref_Ni.dat ref_m1.5.dat niti_m2.0c.dat niti_m2.5c.dat niti_m3.0c.dat niti_m3.5c.dat niti_m4.0c.dat niti_m5.0c.dat niti_m6.0c.dat
